name: SemiElectricHospitalBedSupply
title: Semi electric Hospital Bed Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Hospital bed durable medical equipment equipped with electric controls for some functions.),(Data Element Scope: Durable medical equipment, electronically and manually controlled hospital beds as defined by US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment equipped with electric controls for some functions.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hospital bed durable medical equipment without electronic  controls.)
